findings.title: Solidity version is not locked
findings.description: The solidity version is not locked which can cause development and deployment to have different versions.

findings.title: Solidity version is not the same
findings.description: Different solidity versions are used across contracts (pragma solidity ^0.4.24; and pragma solidity ^0.7.0;) which can lead to inconsistencies. It's recommended to use a locked version with the same in all files.

findings.title: Function that can be declared external
findings.description: Some functions in Smart Wallet and MultiOwnable contracts should be declared as external.
